Package suncertify.db

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatabaseMetaData
    The DatabaseMetaData interface defines the variables for indexing an array of Strings denoting a single record representing a contractor in the application database.
    DBMain
    The DBMain interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Data
    The Data class is a singleton that manages access to the application database file.
    DataAccessObjectFactory
    The DataAccessObjectFactory class is the factory for creating the data access object in this application.
    DBRecord
    The DBRecord class encapsulates a contractor record, it extends the ContractorRecord.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DBAccessException
    The DBAccessException class is the runtime exception thrown when system related or database operational mode violation issues are encountered in the the data access object.
    DuplicateKeyException
    The DuplicateKeyException class is thrown to indicate an attempt to add a record with a duplicate key to the application database.
    RecordNotFoundException
    The RecordNotFoundException to indicate database search and read attempts that yield zero results.
